text: Soul Blade released in Japanese arcades as is a fighting video game developed by Project Soul and published by Namco. It was the first installment in the Soulcalibur series. Originaly release on Arcade in 1995, then later ported in PlayStation in December 20, 1996. title: Soul Blade
